stories.title: Joe Biden signs order to provide $600m military assistance to Ukraine
With Activation of NATO Response Force, U.S. Military Ready to Provide Forces

stories.text:
Hey guys,

I believe you have heard the news about Ukraine. Russia is bombing cities all over Ukraine. The capital Kyiv is under severe attack. Ukrainian Army demonstrates the wonders of courage and continues fighting back.

To protect Ukraine, we need all the help we can get. Every person that supports Ukraine morally and financially makes a difference.

We created a special NFT collection. All the profits from it will be directed to help Ukrainian Army and all the people who suffered from Russiaâ€™s military actions. Please buy & share within your communities. The link is here: https://paras.id/collection/stand-with-ukraine-by-7638f873c2de1d2156cd28e8cda3d45c133263d90147d63bf710a7b8548b2c42

If you want to support us in more ways, share truthful information about the situations in Ukraine. Russian propaganda must be stopped. The confirmed info sources we encourage you to use: https://t.me/ukrainenowenglish
stories.title: Ukrainians are selling NFTs to get money for humanitarian help
Using GitHub to manage your first CVE
The (Financial) Backstory: BART (Bay Area Rapid Transit)

stories.text:
Hello HN !

My name is Satyam, i am a french startup founder (currently building a pos for restaurant), localized in The Caribbean and was struggling centralizing all brand and design assets to communicate with contractors, PR execs, collaborators and partners.

In fact, In the same day, my Sales guys ask me for an email template for prospecting, marketing agencies i was putting in competition asked me a ton of details on my branding that i HAVE but takes couple of hours to search, format and send, i have noticed also that my dev made subtle colors variations of red through our app on the different buttons,... I have searched for a dead simple tool for centralizing, in an effective way and sharing brand assets and i finish by building it myself. think about the "Design / Brand guidelines" section of big internet brands websites, i was searching for an online creator for that kind of pages.

Every tool i have found was big BAM (Brand Assets Management) tools for big corps, or arty tools by and for designers. Not the startup founder / CEO / CMO / PM dedicated tool i was searching for.

So after 2 weeks of coding here is bwandy. I will be very pleased to have some descent feedback to know if i was the only one to have the problem. You can sign up free without credit cart (find the corresponding link in the start trial page). Thanks you a lot guys !!
stories.title: Show HN: A Brand Guidelines Online builder for owners and managers
